section.p: Sets the output log file for the SDK. All logs generated during SDK runtime will be written to this file.
Sets the SDK's output log file. All logs generated during SDK runtime will be written to this file.
Sets the output log file of the SDK. All logs generated during SDK runtime will be written to this file.
Sets the output log file for the SDK. All logs generated during SDK runtime will be written to this file.
section.note: The app must ensure the specified directory exists and is writable.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called immediately after , otherwise the logs may be incomplete.
This method must be called immediately after , otherwise the log output may be incomplete.
You need to call this method immediately after , otherwise the output logs may be incomplete.
This method must be called immediately after , otherwise the output logs may be incomplete.

plentry.pd: The full path of the log file. The log file is encoded in UTF-8.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
